column1: Regular traffic reports will resume Thursday February 27 at 6:30 a.m.

column3: TRAFFIC ALERT FOR NEW CIRCLE RD AT LEESTOWN RD:
column4: The outer loop is shutdown just past the overpass until further notice.  Serious multi-vehicle injury collision.  Traffic diverted to the Leestown Rd exit.

column3: TRAFFIC ALERT FOR NEW CIRCLE RD AT LEESTOWN RD:
column4: No access to outer loop New Circle Rd from Leestown Rd or Georgetown Rd.

column3: TRAFFIC ALERT FOR NEW CIRCLE RD AT LEESTOWN RD:
column4: Traffic on the inner loop between Old Frankfort Pike and Leestown Rd is moving very slowly and may be stopped as needed by Police during the investigation.

column3: TRAFFIC ALERT FOR NEW CIRCLE RD AT LEESTOWN RD:
column4: Motorists on W Main St / Leestown Rd between Newtown Pike and S Yarnallton Pike can expect long delays in both directions.
